item.title: 10 Best Movies About The Iraq War
item.description: A number of truly powerful movies focused around the Iraq War have left their mark, and Alex Garland and Ray Mendoza's Warfare is the next great one.

item.title: "He Changed My Life:" Black Panther Director Ryan Coogler Reveals He & Michael B. Jordan Still Draw Inspiration From Chadwick Boseman
item.description: Black Panther director Ryan Coogler voices his admiration for Chadwick Boseman's professionalism and shares an MCU anecdote involving the late actor.

item.title: Now We Know John Walker's MCU Actor Is In Avengers: Doomsdayâ€™s Cast, I Need To Know What Happens In His Story In Thunderbolts* More Than Ever
item.description: It looks like John Walker will be returning in Avengers: Doomsday, and now I think his arc in Thunderbolts* is more important than ever.
